name: Cummin Powder
detail: Roast the cumin seeds, make the powder and you can add pinch of it to Moong Dal, Khichdi, Vegetable oats, Daliya, Soups, vegetable purees and plain curd or You can saute in ghee also while making porridge.

name: Corriander Powder
detail: Add pinch of it to Vegetable Khichdi, Vegetable oats.

name: Cinnamon Powder
detail: Apple porridge, pancakes, oats prorridge, Ragi Porridge, pancakes, Khichdi

name: Fennel Powder
detail: Oats porridge, Makhana porridge, Poha Porridge, Wheat Daliya Primarily when you wants to make sweet flavour by adding fruits this will enhance the taste.

name: Pepper Powder
detail: Make the powder and you can add pinch of it to Moong Dal, Khichdi, Vegetable oats, Daliya, Soups, vegetable purees.

name: Turmeric Powder
detail: Depends on quantity of food, you can add into soups, khichdi, daal porridge,  vegetable oats

name: Asafoetida
detail: Just a pinch you can add to Khichdi, Mashed Daal porridge

name: Mango Powder
detail: Very little you can add to Daal porridge

name: Mint Paste
detail: You can add it to Soups, vegetable purees, Khichdi, plain curd

name: Garlic Paste
detail: Make the paste and you can add pinch of it to Moong Dal, Khichdi, Vegetable oats, Daliya, Soups, vegetable purees. If you dont want to add paste than you can add whole while cooking food and once food is ready you can remove it. This will add the flavour to food

name: Ginger Paste
detail: Make the paste and you can add pinch of it to Moong Dal, Khichdi, Vegetable oats, Daliya, Soups, vegetable purees, vegetable Rice porridge If you dont want to add paste than you can add whole while cooking food and once food is ready you can remove it. This will add the flavour to food

name: Smooth Tamarind pulp
detail: If you want to add little tangy flaour to any dish like sambhar than you can add smooth pulp and mix it nicely

name: Nutmeg Powder
detail: Very little(pinch of) you can add to oats, Poha porridge, Makhana porridge, Rice porridge, dry fruits powder(8+ M)
